languages.text: "Я не молод. Ставлю свое упрямство против своего же слабого сердца. Посмотрим, что сломается первым".
"I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see which breaks first."
languages.original_text: "Я не молод. Ставлю свое упрямство против своего же слабого сердца. Посмотрим, что сломается первым".

traits.locale_text: "I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see what breaks first."
"I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see what breaks first."
"I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see what breaks first."
"I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see what breaks first."
"I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see which breaks first."
"I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see which breaks first."

languages.text: “我已经不年轻了。我只能赌一把，看看是我的固执会获胜，还是我脆弱的心智会先崩溃。”
languages.original_text: "I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see which breaks first."

traits.locale_text: “我已经不年轻了。我只能赌一把，看看是我的固执会获胜，还是我脆弱的心会先崩溃。”

languages.text: 「私は、もう若くはありません。私の頑固さがこの弱い心臓にさえも勝ってしまうと、賭けます。さぁ、どちらが先に壊れるか、見物ですね」
languages.original_text: "I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see which breaks first."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、もう若くはありません。私の頑固さがこの弱い心臓にさえも勝ってしまうと、賭けます。さぁ、どちらが先に壊れるか、見物ですね」

languages.text: «Ya no soy joven. No sé qué se quebrará primero, si mi cabezonería o mi corazón débil».
languages.original_text: "I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see which breaks first."

traits.locale_text: «Ya no soy joven. No sé qué se quebrará primero, si mi cabezonería o mi corazón débil».

languages.text: "Ich bin nicht länger jung. Ich wette, meine Sturheit hält länger aus als mein schwaches Herz. Aber wir werden sehen."
languages.original_text: "I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see which breaks first."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nicht länger jung. Ich wette, meine Sturheit hält länger aus als mein schwaches Herz. Aber wir werden sehen."

languages.text: « Je ne suis plus tout jeune. Entre mon obstination et mon cœur fragile, je parie sur mon obstination. Nous verrons bien ce qui cèdera en premier. »
languages.original_text: "I am no longer young. My money is on my stubbornness against my weak heart. Let's see which breaks first."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis plus tout jeune. Entre mon obstination et mon cœur fragile, je parie sur mon obstination. Nous verrons bien ce qui cèdera en premier. »
